title: What to do if you need help with high energy costs this winter
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Energy costs this winter are expected to rise, meaning you'll likely pay more to heat your house or apartment. WBUR reporters Miriam Wasser and Yasmin Amer join us to talk about ways Massachusetts residents can apply for relief.
